nodes.text: The Frangawl Cult, also known as the Frangawl clan, was a cult from Bardotta dedicated to the worship of Malmourral, the Bardottan demon of war. Once banished by the Dagoyan Order, they foresaw a time when those masters would disappear. During the Clone Wars, they captured the planet's Queen Julia in attempt to fulfill their prophecy. They revered the witch Talzin as the Great Mother.
